lifecycle.sourceOfTruth: audiense zeroheight dialog page (captured) + titan-comp-doc/dialog source when available
lifecycle.usageRule: Implement Dialog from source contract first. If docs/rules/spec conflict, source-of-truth wins.
lifecycle.migrationTrigger: Sync local docs/rules/spec when dialog source updates.

dialog.description: Modal dialog for confirmational, informational or blocking tasks. Includes overlay, container, header/body/footer and optional illustration.

canonicalTerminology.rule: Use canonical names in docs/rules/contracts; avoid aliases.

structure.illustrationRule: Illustration is optional; never required for the component to be valid.

sizing.widthBehavior: Content-first with max width; never overflow viewport.
sizing.heightBehavior: Use internal content scroll when body exceeds available height.
sizing.density: Respect spacing tokens; do not hardcode px values when token exists.

interaction.focus: Trap focus while open and return focus to trigger on close.

feedback: empty informational state when no content payload

actions.order: Primary action should be visually dominant; secondary/tertiary less prominent.
actions.layout: Footer actions can stack or align horizontally depending on width.

blockingRules: If required dialog anatomy cannot be satisfied, return BLOCKER.
If requested variant omits required state handling, return FAIL.
Do not force illustration; include only when context requires it.
